article_metadata.author: Doug Ireland direland@eagletribune.com

og.description: PLAISTOW — The New Hampshire Attorney General's Office and Rockingham County attorney's office are investigating longtime police Lt. William Baldwin for "irregularities" that occurred during two recent traffic stops, Town
og.title: Plaistow police lieutenant investigated
